Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations. Given its high value and unique features, I am confident it will be a game-changer for you. Considering its worth to you, I propose a price of $11,000 for this exceptional product. This offer is tailored to ensure you receive the best value while also allowing us to maintain a fair profit margin. Please let me know if you require any further information or have questions about the product. I look forward to the opportunity to collaborate with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $11,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $11,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
